text: Baluna, ‘tomara amake sambada da'o, tomara allah‌ra paribarte yaderake daka amake dekha'o to tara yamine ki srsti kareche athaba asamanasamuhe tadera kono ansidaritba ache ki? Era purbabati kono kitaba athaba paramparagata kono jnana thakale ta tomara amara kache niye asa yadi tomara satyabadi ha'o [1].’
